overview:
Brian is a iPhone / iPad designer and developer.

Brian has nearly 15 years of experience building and designing desktop and web applications. Brian is a co-applicant on 4 patents pending from his work writing some of the first web applications for the original iPhone. Brian managed several project teams during his four years with Apple Inc.. Brian was the manager of the user interface engineering group for .Mac (now MobileMe) and worked for the iTunes store. In the summer of 2007, he led the user interface engineering team in the successful launch of the .Mac Web Gallery for the iPhone and web.

Brian was a 2009 Webby Honoree for his work on the Springfield Town Center website.

Brian has either designed or developed more than 10 apps that are currently for sale in the Apple iTunes App Store.
